answers.answer: I'm 28 weeks and measuring 31 weeks....I'm due March 5 :-)

I'm 30 weeks, measuring 31 weeks. Measuring that far ahead are you sure you don't have gestational diabetes??

Sure I have did the one hour and the three hour and both came back negative.I think my doctor wont listen to me because I could be this for along. I kept track of everything but she will not check me again.
Hmmmm maybe just keep pushing her, if you don't have GD it seems odd to be measuring that far ahead and not have a reason

I know I go to the doctor on the 31st and going to  make her check on the baby. they have checked for GD three times and all came back negative so I dont know. My due date has never changed. And I am kinda nervous because I live 45 minutes away from the hospital so if something happens it is going to take to long to get to the hospital

question: Anybody else due in March and measuring big. I am due March 22 so I am 27wks. Amd I went to the doctor Monday and I am measuring 31wks. I juat had an ultrasound done last thursday because I am high risk so I get monitored a lot. With the last ultrasounds baby was measuring 30wks and 3lbs.
title: measuring big
